name: Rabbit Jump
description:
Rabbit Jump "Help the white rabbit finding his crashed spaceship jumping on roofs through the big city with neon lights. Who knows, maybe he'll make one of your dreams come true. Second part of the Rabbit Moon series." by Yeray Toledano, Game Designer

 Audiovisual communication Graduated, making some games and having fun! I love pixel art, vaporwave and pastel colors.

Made with Unity 2017, all the graphics are made by me with Photoshop.

Segond part of Rabbit Dream (2017).

Músic by Alex Barat, Songwriter & Music producer

You can contact me with my Twitter, Linkedin or Twitch!
